mapper.insert: INSERT INTO language_capacity (userId, language, readAndWrite, listenAndSpeak, index, createTimeStamp, lastUpdateStamp, isDel) values (#{userId}, #{language}, #{readAndWrite}, #{listenAndSpeak}, #{index}, unix_timestamp(now())*1000, unix_timestamp(now())*1000, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM language_capacity WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE language_capacity
language=#{language},
AND readAndWrite=#{readAndWrite},
AND listenAndSpeak=#{listenAndSpeak},
AND index=#{index},
AND lastUpdateStamp=unix_timestamp(now())*1000
id = #{id}
